resources.string: Find Vaccination centre near you Location And Go to your vaccination center using google map. Here entre your Pin Code and Click on "Find Location" Select you vaccination center and Click on "Navigate" Button For Start navigation form your Location.
Enter Pincode, Select Date and Click on Search Button For Getting vaccine availability in your Area.
Q.1 how to get available vaccine slot?
Ans. For gating sloat notification you can use notification facility provided by check slot section of App, PAYTM, website,and many Telegram group

Q.2 How you can help other and contribute to this app?

Ans. If you are developer the Please check data source for Vaccination center with should have these attributes "Vaccination centre name", "Vaccination centre Address","Area Pincode" and "Pin-point google map link". If you find the source
